Package controller

Class MainScreenController

java.lang.Object
controller.MainScreenController
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.fxml.Initializable
public class MainScreenController extends Object implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
This class is the central hub of this project. It displays tables for customer and appointments.
from here, customers and appointments can be added modified, and deleted. Also, special reports can be accessed.

  • Method Details

    • initialize

      public void initialize(URL url, ResourceBundle resourceBundle)
      initialize determines the initial state of the scene when it gets called. All customers are added to the customers table and all appointments are added to the appointments table.
      Specified by:
      initialize in interface javafx.fxml.Initializable
      Parameters:
      url - points to a uniform resource locator (source: )
      resourceBundle - contains locale-specific objects (source: )

    • addCustomerScene

      public void addCustomerScene(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent) throws IOException
      This method pulls up the Add Customer form.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - called when the add customer button is clicked.
      Throws:
      IOException

    • modifyCustomerScene

      public void modifyCustomerScene(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent) throws IOException
      This method pulls up the Modify Customer form. Gets the selected customer, if one is selected, and
      Passes it to the ModifyCustomerScreenController to modify selected customer.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - called when the modify customer button is clicked.
      Throws:
      IOException

    • deleteCustomer

      public void deleteCustomer(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent) throws SQLException
      This method deletes customers. It gets the highlighted customer from the table and saves the name to a variable
      Calls the boolean return method "isDeletable" from the usefulMethods class to make sure the selection is not null
      This method calls the deleteCustomer method from DBCustomers which deletes appointments associated to that customer.
      The user confirms to delete the customer and associated appointments and the customer is deleted. The table reflects the remaining customers.

      Lambda expression - The functional interface "Confirmation" has its confirmation method overridden
      to accepts a name parameter. The "confirmed" variable is assigned to the Confirmation interface instance. nameyPoo
      is the argument for the lambda expression. The instance calls the confirmation method with the customer's name as an argument
      A pop-up shows confirmation that the customer has been deleted.

      getSelectedRadio is called to show the updated appointments table based on the selected radio button. It refreshes, basically.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - calls method when delete appointment button is pressed
      Throws:
      SQLException

    • addAppointmentScreen

      public void addAppointmentScreen(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent) throws IOException
      This method pulls up the Add appointment form.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - called when the add appointment button is clicked.
      Throws:

    • modifyAppointmentScreen

      public void modifyAppointmentScreen(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent) throws IOException
      This method pulls up the Modify Appointment form. Gets the selected appointment, if one is selected, and
      Passes it to the ModifyAppointmentScreenController to modify selected appointment.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - called when the modify appointment button is clicked.
      Throws:
      IOException

    • deleteAppointment

      public void deleteAppointment(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent) throws SQLException
      This method deletes appointments. It gets the highlighted appointment from the table and saves the id and type to variables
      Calls the boolean return method "isDeletable" from the usefulMethods class to make sure the selection is not null
      A pop-up is shown to confirm deletion. If ok is clicked. The appointment is removed from the database. The table is repopulated
      with appointments and a confirmation pop-up is displayed.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - calls method when delete appointment button is pressed
      Throws:
      SQLException

    • getSelectedRadio

      public void getSelectedRadio(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      This method updates the appointments table. What is shown is determined by the radio button being selected
      appointments can be shown for the week, the month, or all of them.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - called when radio buttons are selected.

    • toReportsScreen

      public void toReportsScreen(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent) throws IOException
      This method pulls up the Reports form. This form shows reports not seen in the Main Screen
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - called when the modify customer button is clicked.
      Throws:
      IOException
